entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
